flawed_nl_solution:
The boat had 20 - 3 = <<20-3=17>>17 sheep make it to shore.
3 sheep drowned, so 2 * 3 = <<2*3=6>>6 cows drowned.
10 cows on the boat - 6 drowned = <<10-6=9>>9 cows made it to the shore.
17 sheep + 9 cows + 14 dogs = <<17+9+14=40>>40 animals made it to shore.
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
